data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 20,678 believers in Krishnagiri.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Krishnagiri, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Krishnagiri to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
God, we pray for the believers in Krishnagiri, Tamil Nadu, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, may the churches in Krishnagiri, Tamil Nadu, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Karumpuram people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Karumpuram people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Karumpuram people is yours.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Krishnagiri, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 20,678 believers in Krishnagiri to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,859,122 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Krishnagiri.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

location.name: Krishnagiri
location.people_groups_list: Bazigar (Hindu traditions), Vakkaliga Kunchitiga, Ambalavasi Kambalattu, Ambattan, Eravallan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bazigar (Hindu traditions) (327,000), Vakkaliga Kunchitiga (241,000), Ambalavasi Kambalattu (2,900), Ambattan (178,000), Eravallan (7,700)
